cboCostEstimates.description: As reported by the House Committee on Homeland Security on January 21, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 5633, Department of Homeland Security Inspector General Transparency Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 183 (Tuesday, October 19, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. THOMPSON of Mississippi:
H.R. 5633.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8
[Page H5674]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

title: Department of Homeland Security Inspector General Transparency Act
